languages.text: {n}Соломон вздыхает.{/n} "Я понимаю. Давай еще немного посидим, а потом пойдем". {n}Он кладет вашу ладонь в свою и надолго застывает.{/n}
{n}Solomorne sighs.{/n} "I understand. Let's sit a little longer, and then we'll go." {n}He takes your hand in his and is still for a long while.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Соломон вздыхает.{/n} "Я понимаю. Давай еще немного посидим, а потом пойдем". {n}Он кладет вашу ладонь в свою и надолго застывает.{/n}

languages.text: {n}ソロモーンはため息をついた。{/n}「わかりました。もう少し座ってから、行きましょう」{n}彼はあなたの手を取ったまま、しばらく動かなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs.{/n} "I understand. Let's sit a little longer, and then we'll go." {n}He takes your hand in his and is still for a long while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}ソロモーンはため息をついた。{/n}「わかりました。もう少し座ってから、行きましょう」{n}彼はあなたの手を取ったまま、しばらく動かなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne seufzt.{/n} "Ich verstehe. Lasst uns noch eine Weile hier sitzen, dann gehen wir." {n}Er nimmt deine Hand in die seine und schweigt lange.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs.{/n} "I understand. Let's sit a little longer, and then we'll go." {n}He takes your hand in his and is still for a long while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne seufzt.{/n} "Ich verstehe. Lasst uns noch eine Weile hier sitzen, dann gehen wir." {n}Er nimmt deine Hand in die seine und schweigt lange.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne soupire.{/n} « Je comprends. Profitons encore un peu du spectacle, avant de repartir. » {n}Il vous prend la main et demeure immobile un long moment.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs.{/n} "I understand. Let's sit a little longer, and then we'll go." {n}He takes your hand in his and is still for a long while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne soupire.{/n} « Je comprends. Profitons encore un peu du spectacle, avant de repartir. » {n}Il vous prend la main et demeure immobile un long moment.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne suspira.{/n} «Entiendo. Quedémonos aquí sentados un poco más, luego podremos irnos». {n}Te agarra de la mano y se queda muy quieto durante un largo rato.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs.{/n} "I understand. Let's sit a little longer, and then we'll go." {n}He takes your hand in his and is still for a long while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne suspira.{/n} «Entiendo. Quedémonos aquí sentados un poco más, luego podremos irnos». {n}Te agarra de la mano y se queda muy quieto durante un largo rato.{/n}

languages.text: {n}索罗蒙叹了口气。{/n}“我明白。我们再坐一会儿，然后就走吧。”{n}他握着你的手，一动不动，坐了很久很久。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs.{/n} "I understand. Let's sit a little longer, and then we'll go." {n}He takes your hand in his and is still for a long while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}索罗蒙叹了口气。{/n}“我明白。我们再坐一会儿，然后就走吧。”{n}他握着你的手，一动不动，坐了很久很久。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Solomorne iç çekiyor.{/n} "Anlıyorum. Biraz daha oturalım, sonra kalkarız." {n}Elini tutup uzunca bir süre kımıldamadan bekliyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Solomorne sighs.{/n} "I understand. Let's sit a little longer, and then we'll go." {n}He takes your hand in his and is still for a long while.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Solomorne iç çeker.{/n} "Anlıyorum. Biraz daha oturalım, sonra kalkarız." {n}Elini tutar ve uzunca bir süre kımıldamaz.{/n}
